CODIF_DATA.TY_TYPE_BID: Submission for one or more lots

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: In accordance with the law of 29.4.1999 concerning the liberalisation of the electricity market, Elia has been appointed as transmission grid operator and supervises the safety, reliability and efficiency of the transmission grid. Elia must therefore ensure the provision of the required ancillary services. In this context, Elia intends to conclude with one or several companies an agreement for the supply of the Black-Start service 2018-2020.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: In accordance with the law of 29 April 1999 concerning the liberalisation of the electricity market, Elia has been appointed as transmission grid operator and supervises the safety, reliability and efficiency of the transmission grid. Elia must therefore ensure the provision of the required ancillary services.
In this context, Elia intends to conclude with one or several companies an agreement for the supply of the Black-Start Service 2018-2020.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: For the delivery period of 1.11.2018 until 31.12.2020 included, Elia will contract power plants for the supply of the Black-Start Service in accordance with her need described in the document "Bidding instructions and awarding criteria BS 2018-2020" downloadable on Elia's website (http://www.elia.be/en/suppliers/purchasing-categories/energy-purchases/Ancillary-services/How-to-candidate-make-offer).

This lot is dedicated to the delivery period of 1.11.2018 to 31.12.2020 included. The power plants to be contracted by Elia must be situated in the Belgian control area and included in a valid CIPU contract.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: In accordance with the law of 29.4.1999 concerning the liberalisation of the electricity market, Elia has been appointed as transmission grid operator and supervises the safety, reliability and efficiency of the transmission grid. Elia must therefore ensure the provision of the required ancillary services.
In this context, Elia intends to conclude with one or several companies an agreement for the supply of the Black-Start Service 2018-2020.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: For the delivery period of 1.11.2018 until 31.12.2020 included, Elia will contract power plants for the supply of the Black-Start Service in accordance with her need described in the document "Bidding instructions and awarding criteria BS 2018-2020" downloadable on Elia's website (http://www.elia.be/en/suppliers/purchasing-categories/energy-purchases/Ancillary-services/How-to-candidate-make-offer).

This lot is dedicated to the delivery period of 1.11.2018 to 31.10.2019 included. The power plants to be contracted by Elia must be situated in the Belgian control area and included in a valid CIPU contract.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: In accordance with the law of 29.4.1999 concerning the liberalisation of the electricity market, Elia has been appointed as transmission grid operator and supervises the safety, reliability and efficiency of the transmission grid. Elia must therefore ensure the provision of the required ancillary services.
In this context, Elia intends to conclude with one or several companies an agreement for the supply of the Black-Start Service 2018-2020.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: For the delivery period of 1.11.2018 until 31.12.2020 included, Elia will contract power plants for the supply of the Black-Start Service in accordance with her need described in the document "Bidding instructions and awarding criteria BS 2018-2020" downloadable on Elia's website (http://www.elia.be/en/suppliers/purchasing-categories/energy-purchases/Ancillary-services/How-to-candidate-make-offer).

This lot is dedicated to the delivery period of 1.11.2019 to 31.12.2020 included. The power plants to be contracted by Elia must be situated in the Belgian control area and included in a valid CIPU contract.
For the delivery period of 1.11.2018 until 31.12.2020 included, Elia will contract power plants for the supply.

Of the Black-Start Service in accordance with her need described in the document "Bidding instructions and awarding criteria BS 2018-2020" downloadable on Elia's website (http://www.elia.be/en/suppliers/purchasing-categories/energy-purchases/Ancillary-services/How-to-candidate-make-offer). Three lots are defined corresponding to the full delivery period or to a part of it. The power plants to be contracted by Elia must be situated in the Belgian control area and included in a valid CIPU contract.

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: An application form detailing the requirement for candidate, a contract template and the bidding instructions including the awarding criteria can be downloaded from the Elia webpage (http://www.elia.be/en/suppliers/purchasing-categories/energy-purchases/Ancillary-services/How-to-candidate-make-offer).

MAIN_FINANCING_CONDITIONS.P: An application form detailing the requirement for candidate, a contract template and the bidding instructions including the awarding criteria can be downloaded from the Elia webpage (http://www.elia.be/en/suppliers/purchasing-categories/energy-purchases/Ancillary-services/How-to-candidate-make-offer).

LEGAL_FORM.P: An application form detailing the requirement for candidate, a contract template and the bidding instructions including the awarding criteria can be downloaded from the Elia webpage (http://www.elia.be/en/suppliers/purchasing-categories/energy-purchases/Ancillary-services/How-to-candidate-make-offer).

EXISTENCE_OTHER_PARTICULAR_CONDITIONS.P: The Supplier must have a valid ARP contract with Elia at the moment of the candidature. The power plants subject to participation in the service must be included in a CIPU contract with Elia.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: The application procedure and conditions for participation can be found in the Application Form for Black-Start 2018-2020 available on the Elia webpage (http://www.elia.be/en/suppliers/purchasing-categories/energy-purchases/Ancillary-services/How-to-candidate-make-offer).

F05_ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_CAPACITY.P: The application procedure and conditions for participation can be found in the Application Form for Black-Start 2018-2020 available on the Elia webpage (http://www.elia.be/en/suppliers/purchasing-categories/energy-purchases/Ancillary-services/How-to-candidate-make-offer).

TECHNICAL_CAPACITY.P: The application procedure and conditions for participation can be found in the Application Form for Black-Start 2018-2020 available on the Elia webpage (http://www.elia.be/en/suppliers/purchasing-categories/energy-purchases/Ancillary-services/How-to-candidate-make-offer).

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION.P: All required documents (see list below) in order to prepare an offer can be downloaded on the Elia webpage (http://www.elia.be/en/suppliers/purchasing-categories/energy-purchases/Ancillary-services/How-to-candidate-make-offer). Interested parties are invited to start preparing an offer based on these documents at their own costs. This invitation to prepare an offer doesn’t imply that you are already officially selected as a candidate in this procurement procedure. Elia will not change these documents on the moment of the call for tender.
3. Bidding instructions and awarding criteria BS 2018-2020
The results of the selection of suppliers will be communicated at latest 23.4.2018.
Only selected suppliers can submit a binding offer based on the above mentioned documents.
The deadline to submit an offer is 11.5.2018.

Elia will retain the best offers as described in the awarding criteria published on the Elia website, subject to the evaluation of the prices by the national regulator CREG. Offers that are deemed as unreasonable will not be considered in the award phase and cannot be attributed a contract depending on the analysis, Elia expects to communicate the results of the tender on 15.9.2018.
